business.headline: Rupee hits all-time low of 87.94 against US dollarThe rupee slumped to a new all-time low of 87.95 per US dollar on Monday as fears over potential US trade tariffs rattled regional currencies. This surpasses last week's record of 87.5825. The currency was last trading at 87.9325, marking a 0.6% decline for the day.

Gautam Adani donates Rs 10,000 crore for social causes at younger son's weddingSources close to billionaire Gautam Adani said the Rs 10,000 crore donation will go into the creation of a network of affordable world-class hospitals and medical colleges and advanced global skill academics with assured employability.

Sensex tanks over 600 points: 3 reasons why stock market is falling todayThe BSE Sensex lost over 600 points, while the NSE Nifty dropped close to 200 points in early trade. The Sensex fell to the day's low of 77,189.04 after closing at 77,860.19 in the previous session.

Sensex, Nifty tumble as rupee hits record low; metal, energy stocks dragThe S&P BSE Sensex was down by 394.07 points to 77,466.12, while the NSE Niftt50 fell by 130.10 points to 23,429.85 as of 9:40 AM.

Rupee crashes 44 paise to all-time low of 87.94 against US dollarIn early trade, the rupee weakened to 87.95 per U.S. dollar, surpassing its previous record low of 87.5825 from last week. It was last trading at 87.9325, down 0.6% for the day.

RBI introduces 'bank.in' domain for Indian banks to tackle financial fraudThe move aims to tackle growing financial fraud and cybercrime, prevent malicious activities, and strengthen the country's financial ecosystem.

entertainment.headline: Taylor Swift shocked after Eagles fans boo her at Super BowlTaylor Swift, the renowned pop star, faced an unexpected reaction from Eagles fans during her appearance at Super Bowl LIX. The unexpected boos left her and many others wondering about the cause.

Punjabi actor-singer Harrdy Sandhu briefly detained over gig permit in ChandigarhSinger Harrdy Sandhu was detained in Chandigarh on Saturday for performing live without permission. He was later released after organisers provided documents. However, the incident left the Punjabi singer upset as he didn't perform after being released.

While it evokes nostalgia, its simple plot and dated gender roles may not resonate with all. Strong performances and a heartfelt message make it a warm, fulfilling watch.

general news.headline: 300 km-long traffic jam chokes Maha Kumbh, Akhilesh Yadav's jab at UP governmentMaha Kumbh: As a result of the severe traffic jam, many devotees were unable to reach the Sangam area to take a holy dip amid the ongoing Maha Kumbh. The pilgrims have raised serious concerns over management issues.

Bangladesh's 'devil hunt' to tackle violence, 1,300 arrested in sweeping crackdownBangladesh's interim government, led by Chief Adviser Muhammad Yunus, has launched 'Operation Devil Hunt,' a nationwide crackdown involving over 1,300 arrests to curb escalating violence targeting Awami League leaders and properties.
